mapper.select: select product_id as productId, name, price, discounted_price as discountedPrice, discount_rate as discountRate, thumbnail_image as thumbnailImage, stock from Products where status='ACTIVE' order by product_id DESC LIMIT #{limit}

select product_id as productId, name, price, discounted_price as discountedPrice, discount_rate as discountRate, thumbnail_image as thumbnailImage, stock FROM Products WHERE status = 'ACTIVE' and product_id < #{lastProductId} ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT #{limit}

select p.product_id as productId, p.influencer_id as influencerId, p.name, p.description, p.price, p.discounted_price as discountedPrice, p.discount_rate as discountRate, p.shipping_price as shippingPrice, p.stock, p.thumbnail_image as thumbnailImage, p.detail_images as detailImages, p.description_images as descriptionImages, m.grade_id as gradeId, case m.grade_id when 1 then p.white_open_time when 2 then p.silver_open_time when 3 then p.gold_open_time when 4 then p.vip_open_time else p.general_open_time end as openTime, case when now() >= case m.grade_id when 1 then p.white_open_time when 2 then p.silver_open_time when 3 then p.gold_open_time when 4 then p.vip_open_time else p.general_open_time end then true else false end as isAvailable from products p left join memberships m on m.user_id = #{userId} and m.influencer_id = p.influencer_id and m.status = 'ACTIVE' where p.product_id = #{productId}

select product_id as productId, name, price, discounted_price as discountedPrice, discount_rate as discountRate, thumbnail_image as thumbnailImage, stock from products where status = 'ACTIVE' AND name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') order by product_id desc limit #{limit}

select product_id as productId, name, price, discounted_price as discountedPrice, discount_rate as discountRate, thumbnail_image as thumbnailImage, stock from products where product_id < #{lastProductId} and status = 'ACTIVE' and name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') order by product_id desc limit #{limit}
